content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for considering my apartment. Based on my research, I believe that a fair rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is 1,000 Euros per month. Would you be willing to agree to this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 950 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand, Juan. Thank you for your willingness to negotiate with me. I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. Is there anything else you need to discuss before we finalize the rental agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, that's it. Thank you very much for your help. I will sign the agreement as soon as possible.

TERMINATE
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your prompt response, Juan. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. Good luck with your move to New York!
name: Heinrich Heine
